name: Odoo DevContainer
postCreateCommand: python3 -m venv /home/odoo/venv && /home/odoo/venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && ([ -f /mnt/extra-addons/requirements.txt ] && /home/odoo/venv/bin/pip install --no-cache-dir -r /mnt/extra-addons/requirements.txt || echo 'No requirements.txt found, skipping...')
